Segment.name: LCT
Segment.comment: To identify the necessary information for tracking containers and identifying contents of containers

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: PackagingFormCode
Field.comment: Code for packaging form of the lading quantity

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: UnitWeight
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight per unit

Field.name: MeasurementUnitQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the linear dimensional unit

Field.name: Length
Field.comment: Largest horizontal dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position
